definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic

sentences.english: I have as my first one was male, first two actually.
sentences.chinese: 我第一个就是男妇产科医生，实际上前两个。

sentences.english: Results The standard values of indicators for maternity care quality evaluation was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 结果确立了产科护理质量评价指标的标准值。

sentences.english: After the exam, the OB- GYN told her that she was pregnant, and in great shape.
sentences.chinese: 体检完后，妇产科医生说她怀孕了，并且肚子已大。

sentences.english: A woman once brought her husband, an OB/ GYN , to the temple.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，有个居士带着她妇产科医生的先生到道场来。

sentences.english: Please call a pediatric resident to the operation room.
sentences.chinese: 请叫妇产科住院医师速到抢救室来。

sentences.english: He is a famous Pakistani ob-gyn who was educated in Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 他，是巴基斯坦有名的妇产科医生。

sentences.english: Obstetric explanations for nausea and vomiting may include multiple pregnancies or a hydatidiform mole.
sentences.chinese: 产科出现恶心呕吐的可能包括多胎妊娠或葡萄胎。

sentences.english: The disposable and atraumatic suture needle with catgut suture applies to obstetrics and gynaecology department.
sentences.chinese: 无菌医用羊肠线无损伤缝合针，适用于妇产科手术。

sentences.english: The American College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists "strongly opposes" them.
sentences.chinese: 美国妇产科学院“强烈反对”在家分娩。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the nursing effect in drug therapy in obstetrical.
sentences.chinese: 探讨护理程序在产科药物治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: Uterine atony with obstetric bleeding was the primary cause of obstetric hysterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 宫缩乏力导致的产科出血是子宫切除的首要原因。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the reasons and experiences of misdiagnosis in gynecological patients with intraabdominal hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结妇产科腹腔内出血性疾病的误诊经验教训。

sentences.english: At about eight-and-a-half weeks, we wentto see an O.B.
sentences.chinese: 在八周半的时候，我们去看妇产科医生。

sentences.english: Pla cental disorder was the main indication of emergency hysterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 胎盘因素是产科急症子宫切除术的主要指征。

sentences.english: Patients' families sleep on floors and in a courtyard next to the labor wards.
sentences.chinese: 患者的家属只能睡在产科病房边上一个院子的地上。

sentences.english: The International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics (FIGO) recently revised its staging criteria.
sentences.chinese: 国际妇产科联盟最近修订了宫颈癌的分期标准。

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
to help a mother give birth
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
